casebody.data:
Mahoning County Bar Association v. Davis.

[Cite as Mahoning Cty. Bar Assn. v. Davis (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 37.]

(No. 91-856 Submitted June 26, 1991 Decided October 9, 1991.) *38Richard B. Blair, for relator. Mary Jane Stevens and John B. Juhasz, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings and recommendations of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
